AppPush.Title: [EN] Update regarding to Honkai Impact 3rd v7.4.0 Game Repair issue
AppPush.Message:
Hi Captains!
The Game Repair issue should be fixed as of version 1.80.1! That being said, should you be running on 1.80.0, you may encounter some issues related to memory and/or Cache Update functionality. Please update as soon as possible!

RegionPush.Title: [EN] Honkai: Star Rail Launch 'Global Distribution' error
RegionPush.Message:
Heyya Trailblazers!
We have noticed that on the latest update for HSR, there is a chance that your game will not start and give out 'Global Distribution' error. We have implemented a fix, but in the event that you still cannot open the game, click the button below for a workaround.

RegionPush.Title: [CN] 给中国大陆用户
RegionPush.Message: 如果您遇到了使用启动器预加载或正式更新过程中极为缓慢或反复断线的问题，可以尝试重新启动 Collapse 或更换网络环境。**这并不是启动器的技术错误造成的**。

RegionPush.Title: [CN] 给中国大陆用户
RegionPush.Message: 如果您遇到了使用启动器预加载或正式更新过程中极为缓慢或反复断线的问题，可以尝试重新启动 Collapse 或更换网络环境。**这并不是启动器的技术错误造成的**。

RegionPush.Title: [EN] Notice Regarding Honkai Impact 3rd 7.3.0 Breaking Feature
RegionPush.Message:
Hi Captains!
7.3.0 Part 2 update is just around the corner and we all are excited for the update! Unfortunately, due to some breaking changes that we have to do on the backend, **Delta Patch** and **Repair/Cache Update** features will not be available until further notice. We are sorry for the inconvenience and we will be working to fix the broken feature ASAP. Don't worry as basic launcher functionality like the regular update method should work just fine.

RegionPush.Title: [CN] 关于崩坏3 7.3.0 破坏性功能的通知
RegionPush.Message:
舰长们好!
7.3.0 第二部更新即将到来，我们都很期待这次更新！很不幸，由于我们必须在后台进行一些破坏性更改，**Delta Patch**和**游戏修复/缓存更新**功能直至另行通知前都将无法使用。很抱歉给您带来不便，我们将尽快修复损坏的功能。但不用担心，基本的启动器功能如常规更新等应该可以正常使用。
